author: Pierluigi Paganini
description: Juniper fixed nearly 220 flaws in Junos OS, Junos Space, and Security Director, including nine critical bugs in Junos Space. Juniper Networks released patches to address nearly 220 vulnerabilities in Junos OS, Junos Space, and Security Director, including nine critical flaws in Junos Space. One of these flaws, tracked as CVE-2025-59978 (CVSS score of 9.0), […]
title: Juniper patched nine critical flaws in Junos Space

author: Pierluigi Paganini
description: Russia-linked actors use AI to craft phishing and malware attacks against entities in Ukraine, says SSSCIP. Russian hackers increasingly use AI in cyberattacks against Ukraine, the country’s State Service for Special Communications and Information Protection (SSSCIP) reported. Beyond AI-generated phishing, some malware samples now show AI-generated code. In H1 2025, Ukraine recorded 3,018 cyber incidents, […]
title: Ukraine sees surge in AI-Powered cyberattacks by Russia-linked Threat Actors

author: Pierluigi Paganini
description: U.S. Cybersecurity and Infrastructure Security Agency (CISA) adds Grafana flaw to its Known Exploited Vulnerabilities catalog. The U.S. Cybersecurity and Infrastructure Security Agency (CISA) added Grafana flaw, tracked as CVE-2021-43798 (CVSS score 7.5), to its Known Exploited Vulnerabilities (KEV) catalog. Grafana is an open-source platform for monitoring and observability.  This flaw is a directory traversal vulnerability affecting versions […]
title: U.S. CISA adds Grafana flaw to its Known Exploited Vulnerabilities catalog

author: Pierluigi Paganini
description: RondoDox botnet exploits 56 known flaws in over 30 device types, including DVRs, CCTV systems, and servers, active globally since June. Trend Micro researchers reported that the RondoDox botnet exploits 56 known flaws in over 30 device types, including DVRs, NVRs, CCTV systems, and web servers, active globally since June. Experts noted that the latest […]
title: RondoDox Botnet targets 56 flaws across 30+ device types worldwide
